FrageText.de: Was wird durch dieses Verkehrszeichen angezeigt?
FrageText.en: What does this road sign refer to?
FrageText.hr: Što se pokazuje ovim prometnim znakom?

de.Text: Eine Kreuzung mit einer Straße ohne Vorrang

en.Text: An intersection in which one street does not have the right of way
The end of a right of way street

hr.Text: Raskrižje sa cestom koja nema prednost prolaska (sporednom cestom)

tr.Text: Yol değerlerinin eşit olduğu bir kavşak
